titles.title: Let All That is Within Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let all that is within me cry, "Holy!"
(repeat 2 times)
Holy, holy, holy is the Lamb that was slain.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Let all that is within me cry, "Worthy!"
(Repeat 2 times).
Worthy, worthy,
worthy is the Lamb that was slain.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Let all that is within me cry, "Jesus!"
(Repeat 2 times)
Jesus, Jesus,
Jesus is the Lamb that was slain.
